title: Update UI color scheme to greenish-blue teal with professional spacing

requirements.summary: Change the primary UI color scheme from light blue to a greenish-blue teal color, updating all color variables in the Tailwind configuration and CSS files to use the new color palette throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Primary UI colors are changed to greenish-blue teal across all components
Color changes are applied consistently in both light and dark themes
All interactive elements (buttons, links, focus states) use the new color palette
The color scheme maintains proper contrast ratios for accessibility

file_operations.description: Update the primary color palette to use greenish-blue teal OKLCH values. Replace existing blue primary color definitions with teal equivalents (e.g., oklch(0.7 0.15 180) for base teal). Ensure the color scale includes appropriate lightness variations for hover states, active states, and backgrounds while maintaining accessibility contrast ratios.

Update CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes to use the new greenish-blue teal color scheme. Replace --primary, --primary-foreground, and related color variables with teal OKLCH values. Update accent colors, focus ring colors, and interactive state colors to maintain visual consistency with the new palette.

requirements.summary: Update the card component borders to use the new greenish-blue teal color with a flashy/prominent appearance, ensuring the border styling is applied to all card elements including role selector cards, dashboard cards, and portal interface cards
acceptanceCriteria: All card borders use the greenish-blue teal color
Border styling is prominent and visually appealing
Border styling is consistent across all card components (RoleSelector, dashboard cards, portal cards)
The flashy appearance is achieved through appropriate border width, opacity, or glow effects

file_operations.description: Update the role selection cards to use prominent teal borders. Apply border classes using the new teal color (e.g., border-2 border-primary with shadow-lg and hover effects) to create a flashy appearance. Ensure the cards maintain their interactive hover states with enhanced teal glow effects.

Update dashboard card borders to use the new teal color scheme with prominent styling. Apply consistent border classes across all card elements in the tabbed interface to create visual cohesion with the flashy teal appearance.
Update portal interface cards (registration form, tabs) to use teal borders with flashy styling. Ensure border consistency across all card-like elements in the doctor portal view.
Update patient portal card borders to use the new teal color scheme with prominent border styling, maintaining visual consistency with other portal interfaces.
Update admin portal card elements (registration form, dashboard container) to use flashy teal borders, ensuring consistency with the overall design language.
Update card and table container borders to use the new teal color with prominent styling. Apply consistent border classes to maintain the flashy appearance across case management interface elements.
Update accordion and card borders in the doctor management interface to use flashy teal styling, ensuring visual consistency across all management components.

requirements.summary: Refine the UI spacing and layout throughout the application to create a professional, minimalistic, and attractive appearance with proper padding, margins, and whitespace between elements
acceptanceCriteria: All components have consistent and appropriate spacing (padding and margins)
Whitespace is used effectively to create visual hierarchy and breathing room
Layout feels clean, professional, and minimalistic
Spacing follows a consistent scale throughout the application
The overall visual appearance is attractive and polished

file_operations.description: Review and refine the overall application layout spacing. Ensure consistent padding around main content areas and proper margins between major sections. Apply a consistent spacing scale (e.g., px-6 py-8 for containers) to create breathing room and professional appearance.

Refine header spacing with appropriate padding and margins. Ensure proper spacing between logo, navigation elements, authentication controls, and theme toggle. Create visual balance with consistent gap classes between flex items.
Update footer spacing to be consistent with the overall minimalistic design. Apply appropriate padding and margins to create a clean, professional appearance.

Refine spacing in the role selector landing page. Ensure proper padding around the title, description text, and role cards. Apply consistent gap classes between cards and appropriate margins for visual hierarchy. Create breathing room with whitespace to enhance the minimalistic aesthetic.

Refine form spacing with consistent padding between form fields, labels, and sections. Apply appropriate margins around the form container and spacing between input groups to create a clean, professional form layout.
Update spacing in the symptom checker interface. Ensure proper padding around input areas, consistent spacing between results, and appropriate margins for readability and visual hierarchy.

Refine spacing in the medical report analysis component. Apply consistent padding to content sections, appropriate gaps between analysis results, and margins that enhance readability while maintaining a minimalistic appearance.
Update modal spacing with appropriate padding around content areas, consistent spacing between form fields, and proper margins for buttons to create a polished, professional modal interface.
Refine spacing in the access denied screen. Ensure appropriate padding around the icon and message text, with proper vertical spacing to create a clean, centered, professional error state.

requirements.summary: Verify that all existing functionality (authentication, portal navigation, emergency SOS, symptom checker, medical report analysis, admin/doctor dashboards, case management, and doctor management) continues to work correctly after the UI color and spacing changes
acceptanceCriteria: All authentication flows work without errors
Portal navigation and role-based access control functions correctly
Emergency SOS form submission works properly
Symptom checker and medical report analysis features are functional
Admin and doctor dashboards display data correctly
Case management and doctor assignment features work as expected
No regression issues introduced by color or spacing changes

file_operations.description: After applying color and spacing changes, verify that authentication state management, role-based routing, profile setup modal, and theme provider continue to function correctly. Ensure no class name conflicts or styling regressions affect the application logic.

Verify that login/logout functionality, theme toggle, role badges, and navigation continue to work after color and spacing updates. Ensure all interactive elements maintain proper event handlers and state management.
Test role selection navigation and authentication checks after applying teal color scheme and spacing refinements. Verify that portal routing continues to function correctly.
Verify emergency case submission functionality after form spacing and color updates. Ensure form validation, submission handlers, and success alerts continue to work correctly.
Test symptom analysis functionality after applying color and spacing changes. Verify that AI analysis requests, results display, and interactive elements function properly.
Verify medical report analysis functionality continues to work after color scheme and spacing updates. Test AI analysis features and results rendering.
Test admin dashboard functionality after applying teal colors and spacing refinements. Verify tab navigation, case management, and doctor management features continue to function correctly.
Verify case filtering, doctor assignment, and status management functionality after color and spacing updates. Ensure all interactive elements and data fetching continue to work properly.
Test doctor registration, department organization, and case assignment display after applying color scheme and spacing changes. Verify accordion functionality and data management work correctly.
